casebody.data:
COMMAND CONSTRUCTION INDUSTRIES, L.L.C.
v.
LOUISIANA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION AND DEVELOPMENT and Sherri Lebas, in Her Official Capacity as Secretary of Louisiana Department of Transportation and Development Design Precast and Pipe, Inc.
v.
Command Construction Industries, the Ohio Casualty Insurance Company, and the State of Louisiana Through the Department of Transportation and Development Command Construction Industries, L.L.C
v.
John E. Bonneau & Associates, Inc. NO. 2018-CC-1636 Supreme Court of Louisiana. December 17, 2018

Denied.
